title: (x) Handwritten script - Schooner Script {Karen}
content:
Hi - I was wondering if anyone knows what typeface this scripty font is? I can't find it anywhere. Thanks. ![script font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142442im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/41268.jpg) ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142442im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/41269.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Ryder Cup 2004 | Team USA - Perpetua {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142442/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5718 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) LXG movie logo - Bank Gothic, Felina Gothic {JMC, Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121142442/http:/www.typophile.com/node/5729 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: Please try again to get the image posted. See the Help page if needed. I'd like to help, but need to see the sample.
Now I can see the images posted by Adriano. It's Schooner Script all right. Good spotting Karen.
